attributes.action: Do not ban the XL bully, have people own a pet licence or to pass a test
attributes.additional_details: The government should do this because what they are planning on doing is disgusting and they should not ban them.
attributes.background: The government should not ban dogs, as dogs are not bad animals it’s the owners. The government should make people have pet licences or have to take a pet test and have a dbs check

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
